abstract: Federal regulators Tuesday denied a request by Verizon Communications to let it charge rival carriers higher rates to get access to lines in six East Coast markets.
snippet: Federal regulators Tuesday denied a request by Verizon Communications to let it charge rival carriers higher rates to get access to lines in six East Coast markets.
lead_paragraph: Federal regulators yesterday denied a request by Verizon Communications to let it charge rival carriers higher rates to get access to lines in six East Coast markets.

headline.main: Verizon Is Denied a Rate Request
headline.print_headline: Verizon Is Denied A Rate Request
